'''''Biographische, theologische und literaturpsychologische Analysen zur Person und zum Werk J.R.R. Tolkiens''''' ("''The Life and Works of J.R.R. Tolkien: An Analysis of Biography, Theology and Psychology of Literature''") is a German-language, scholarly study by Oliver Ilgner on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
